text: Kim Sung-kyung (born February 15, 1972) is a South Korean television personality and actress. Kim joined the broadcasting network SBS in 1993 as a news presenter, notably as the weekend anchor for the SBS Eight O'Clock News. She left SBS in 2002 to go freelance, and also became a planning director for the "edutainment"A portmanteau of "education" and "entertainment." company SangSang and IMeaning "Imagination and I." in 2007. Kim made her acting debut in 2014 (her older sister is actress Kim Sung-ryung), and has appeared in Korean dramas such as City of the Sun (2015). == News/variety programs == {| class="wikitable" style="width:600px" |- ! width=10|Year !
